events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but it doesn’t fit at all. I would like to request a refund for this item.
The customer issue has been evaluated and categorized as a refund request based on their message content.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the returned jacket from the customer.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m here to assist you with the refund process for your jacket.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been returned or if you need instructions on how to do so?
My order number is 45890023, and I haven’t returned the jacket yet. Please send me the return instructions for a refund.
Thank you for the details. Please use the prepaid return label attached to this message and send the jacket back within 14 days for a full refund.
Got it, thanks! I appreciate the quick response and clear instructions. I will return it as soon as possible.
We received your returned jacket and have processed your refund successfully. The amount should reflect in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that the refund has appeared on your end and that everything is satisfactory with the resolution.
Yes, I have received the refund in my bank account. Thank you very much for your help and efficient service.
The refund case has been closed as the customer confirmed receipt of the payment and expressed satisfaction.
